SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Kim Sherwin Leous’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I wish all stakeholders listen to each other and value the insight and experience of teachers and students…”

– Mrs. Kim Sherwin Leous, High School Counselor @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/stakeholders-listen-value-insight-experience-teachers-students/
